frontmatter.title: Rain and Dust through a window

node.excerpt:
The sublimation of this glass pane into cloud -  
Tears shed on a faceless crowd,  
In pointless mournings for an everyday demise:  
When…

The first time I drank, really drank, coffee  
Was when I was seventeen - long, long ago.  
It wasn’t just a cup of espresso;  
those I…

Mr. Joe is a teacher.

Mr. Joe wakes up at 6:30 every morning, spends 30 minutes brushing his teeth, shitting, shaving and showering…

I see people.

They’re about the only things I can see, everything else is just a blur. My eyes actually work OK under perfect lighting…
